## uniqueSymbol() function

去除字符串中重复字符

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function uniqueSymbol(str: string): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| str       | string |             |

**Returns:**

string

string

## Example

uniqueSymbol('1a1bac'); // =<!-- -->&gt; '1abc'
